Allegations loom against reporters, questions remain for former editors like Andy Coulson , while Les Hinton , executive chairman for 12 years until 2007, seemed to be confident hacking was not widespread. Les Hinton told MPs last year: There was never any evidence delivered to me that suggested that the conduct of Clive Goodman spread beyond him. Critical evidence is being extracted from the Metropolitan police.
